hero.title: What is ITBID?
hero.subtitle: The "digital brain" that large and medium-sized companies use to manage everything they buy and their relationship with their vendors (suppliers).
hero.description: It's a cloud platform that replaces the chaos of emails, spreadsheets, and calls with a centralized and efficient system.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.subtitle: ITBID replaces the chaos of emails, spreadsheets, and calls with a centralized and efficient system.

supplierPortal.title: Supplier Portal
supplierPortal.description: A unique space where companies and suppliers collaborate, exchange messages, and share documents with complete transparency.

qualification.title: Qualification & Risks
qualification.description: Before hiring a supplier, ITBID allows you to examine them 'under the magnifying glass'. It analyzes legal compliance, financial health, and ESG criteria.

negotiation.title: Negotiation & Orders
negotiation.description: Automates from request for quotes ('who sells this cheaper and better?') to invoice issuance, eliminating manual errors.

quality.title: Quality Control
quality.description: If something arrives wrong, the system manages the incident for quick resolution. Complete tracking of each purchase lifecycle.

alliance.title: The Alliance with
alliance.subtitle: What makes ITBID truly innovative is not just that it manages purchases, but that it no longer functions as an isolated 'island', but is connected to a secure global data network.

procuredata.title: PROCUREDATA
procuredata.subtitle: The Data Ecosystem
procuredata.description: Imagine having to fill out the same form with your history from scratch every time you visit a new doctor. That's what companies suffer with their suppliers.
procuredata.solution: ITBID, aligned with PROCUREDATA, solves this by creating a Shared Data Space.
procuredata.benefit: If a supplier has already been validated (their identity, sustainability certificates, bank details) within the ecosystem, that information is securely accessible.
procuredata.highlightDesc: Saving thousands of hours of bureaucracy

pontusx.title: PONTUS-X
pontusx.subtitle: Security and Sovereignty
pontusx.description: Sharing such sensitive information between competing companies requires military-grade security.
pontusx.solution: PONTUS-X is the European technological infrastructure (based on Gaia-X principles and Web3/Blockchain technology) on which the data travels.
pontusx.benefit: PONTUS-X guarantees Data Sovereignty. Companies share information without losing control over it.
pontusx.highlightDesc: Truthful, immutable data compliant with European regulations

summary.title: Summary for the General Public
summary.description: ITBID is the tool that companies use to purchase intelligently and sustainably. Thanks to its integration with PROCUREDATA and PONTUS-X, it not only offers management software, but connects companies to a secure 'European digital highway' where supplier information flows in a verified way.

verified.description: Information that flows on a secure digital highway
